SEARCH
Package models

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
models.User
models.Patient
public class Patient extends User
Represents a patient in the hospital management system. This class provides methods for viewing and updating patient details, requesting medical certificates, and viewing medical records. This class also extends to the User class

      Constructs a Patient object with the given details.

      id - the ID of the patient
      name - the name of the patient
      password - the password of the patient
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      contactInfo - the contact email of the patient
      contactNo - the contact number of the patient

      public void requestMedicalCertificate(String reason, int duration)
      Requests a medical certificate for the patient if they have past appointments.
      Parameters:
      reason - the reason for the medical certificate
      duration - the duration (in days) for which the certificate is valid
